alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Northeast Suffolk; Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 8:36PM EST until February 23 at 12:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Southern Nassau, Southern Queens, Kings (Brooklyn), Northwest Suffolk, Northeast Suffolk, Northern Nassau, Northern Queens, Southeast Suffolk and Southwest Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); Northeast Suffolk; Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southwest Suffolk
